features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with login, registration, and JWT token management. Includes protected routes and session persistence via localStorage.

features.name: Book Management Context
features.description: Centralized state management for books, cart operations, and book CRUD operations using React Context API.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page with featured books, hero section, and main call-to-action elements.

features.name: Books Catalog
features.description: Browse and search books with filtering, pagination, and category selection.

features.name: Book Detail Page
features.description: Detailed view of individual books with add-to-cart functionality, ratings, and full descriptions.

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Shopping cart functionality with item management, quantity updates, order summary, and checkout process.

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: Protected user dashboard showing user statistics, order history, and account management.

features.name: My Books Management
features.description: User's book collection management for sellers - view, edit, and delete their listed books.

features.name: Add/Edit Book
features.description: Form for adding new books or editing existing books with image upload, category selection, and validation.

features.name: Navigation Header
features.description: Responsive header with navigation menu, search functionality, cart badge, and user authentication status.

features.name: Footer Component
features.description: Footer with site links, social media, and contact information.

features.name: Book Card Component
features.description: Reusable card component for displaying book information in grid/list views.

features.name: Loading Spinner
features.description: Animated loader component for async operations and page transitions.

features.name: Newsletter Subscription
features.description: Email newsletter subscription form integrated with EmailJS service.

features.name: Lazy Loading Components
features.description: Lazy-loaded components for optimized performance and code splitting.

features.name: Protected Routes
features.description: Route guards that ensure only authenticated users can access certain pages like dashboard and book management.

features.name: Google Books Service Integration
features.description: Integration with Google Books API for additional book data.
